      • initTransform

        public static net.imglib2.realtransform.AffineTransform3D initTransform(int viewerWidth,
                                                                        int viewerHeight,
                                                                        boolean zoomedIn,
                                                                        bdv.viewer.ViewerState state)
        Get a "good" initial viewer transform. The viewer transform is chosen such that for the first source,
        • the XY plane is aligned with the screen plane, at z = 0
        • centered and scaled such that the full dim_x by dim_y is visible.
        Parameters:
        viewerWidth - width of the viewer display
        viewerHeight - height of the viewer display
        zoomedIn - True if zoomed in.
        state - the ViewerState containing at least one source.
        Returns:
        proposed initial viewer transform.

      • initBrightness

        public static void initBrightness(double cumulativeMinCutoff,
                                  double cumulativeMaxCutoff,
                                  bdv.viewer.ViewerState state,
                                  bdv.viewer.ConverterSetups converterSetups)

      • estimateSourceRange

        public static bdv.util.Bounds estimateSourceRange(bdv.viewer.Source<?> source,
                                                  int timepoint,
                                                  double cumulativeMinCutoff,
                                                  double cumulativeMaxCutoff)
        Parameters:
        source - the source.
        timepoint - time point.
        cumulativeMinCutoff - fraction of pixels that are allowed to be saturated at the lower end of the range.
        cumulativeMaxCutoff - fraction of pixels that are allowed to be saturated at the upper end of the range.
        Returns:
        The bounds.
